title: [K-12] Analysis of Instructional Designer Competencies and Educational Program Design: A 4C/ID Model-Based Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theory and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Collaboration and practice-centered operation using learners' personal devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can perform the instructional design process according to the four stages of the 4C/ID model: learning needs analysis, learning task design, learning support strategy development, and evaluation plan development.
Learners can create design documents that select and apply appropriate educational tools and media based on target group analysis results.
Learners can analyze formative assessment data and propose improvements for instructional design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
